channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Azure Web Apps

item.title: CVE-2024-38194|2024-09-17T18:15:47.992Z -- microsoft -- azure%20web%20apps
item.description: An authenticated attacker can exploit an improper authorization vulnerability in Azure Web Apps to elevate privileges over a network.
